body: @Shad wdym? haven't you heard the word "preference/s"?
Shad, i recommend Proclear 1 day multifocal contact lenses. You may have presbyopia. It’s ok, my grandma uses it and she doesn’t complain about it drying up her eyes.

I don't understand how come people prefer Iroha over Yui. Yui isn't the best character but she is still one of the main ships. I'm tired of this HikkixIroha ship, also you simps seem to forget that Iroha is originally a Hayama-bitch.
